rules_text:
During your turn, Ageless Caretaker has indestructible and vigilance.
Ageless Caretaker gets +1/+0 for each other creature you control.
Reflect {1}{G} [i]({1}{G}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Demigod Cleric without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
